channel.title: - Project Wolf V1.1 - [PK/PVP] Release
channel.description:
[color=red][size=15pt]DO NOT FLAME!!![/size][/color]
[color=blue][size=13pt]Please pm me if u going to use this source to code on or host it.[/size][/color]
Okey, This is my CammyPVP based source.
Features: Everything in barragek0: - PvP features, home and startspot at ::pkall is safe zone and others are PvP areas, if you walk in a safe zone in combat you can still be attacked for 10 seconds. - Fixed ranging projectiles against players! - Fixed commonly used spells. - Supply Crates. - Great combat! - Full dclaw spec - DD spec - VLS spec - Statius spec Added by me: - All-VS-All at ::pkall - Home in Barbarian Village with banks,flags,dangersigns,shops... - ::afk and ::back - New itemlist, as normal servers + custom items included in the item.cfg Update from V1 to V1.1 - 1 Security update
Pictures: [IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/3779/homec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/3558/makeovermage.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/3062/magicstoreo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/8187/thepvpstore.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/8625/barrowsstore.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/8187/thepvpstore.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/3908/whiteclawsspec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/8631/vlsspec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/8885/pkall.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/2271/normalskillcapes.jpg[/img]
Sorry for weird pictures i used a lil-bit weird client...
NOTE: White Claws is Dragonclaws on some of the clients and webclients!
Downloads: [b][i]MEDIAFIRE [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?tfklp47yufzu6p7]http://www.mediafire.com/?tfklp47yufzu6p7[/url] (927.96 KB) UPPIT [url=http://uppit.com/w4wjqsbd6fkk/Project_Wolf_V1.1_Release.rar]http://uppit.com/w4wjqsbd6fkk/Project_Wolf_V1.1_Release.rar[/url][/i][/b] (927.96 KB)
Both is V1.1 -------
Credits: xi maul ix Z B0W D0WN Z (hes in-game name of cammypvp idk...) Lotto320 (me)
Hope you liked my release!
ANOTHER NOTE: I did not double-post this project, this is V1.1 ( A small security update )

item.title: - Project Wolf V1.1 - [PK/PVP] Release
item.dc:creator: @lotto320 lotto320
item.description:
@lotto320 wrote:

[quote=“wetodded, post:11, topic:369597”]I will try to be nice on this post. The server is very… buggy. As pointed out in an earlier response, Warrior Rings are stackable. I also noticed that the Dragon Claw special looks incomplete. The shops are in a very “dull” area, and from the first picture, there seems to be some nulls. I see that you have an idea started. However, there is still some work to be done before releasing.

Gl on the rest of the server.[/quote]
That ‘‘much nulls’’ is because i used a pkclient and i had changed the item.cfg to the stage normal servers have, Pkclient’s itemlists is different

Read full topic

item.title: - Project Wolf V1.1 - [PK/PVP] Release
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Well, I like what you’ve done with the Barbarian Village, but not with the NPCs and the stackable rings.
Other than that, I’d say about… 6/10.

Read full topic

item.title: - Project Wolf V1.1 - [PK/PVP] Release
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

I will try to be nice on this post. The server is very… buggy. As pointed out in an earlier response, Warrior Rings are stackable. I also noticed that the Dragon Claw special looks incomplete. The shops are in a very “dull” area, and from the first picture, there seems to be some nulls. I see that you have an idea started. However, there is still some work to be done before releasing.

Gl on the rest of the server.

Read full topic

item.title: - Project Wolf V1.1 - [PK/PVP] Release
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well, I don’t know what to think about the release. Assuming this is Deltascape, I know that it’s going to need some work to the PvP system. Your going to have to work on that quite a lot, might even need to re-write the PvP system.

Good luck with next version mate.

Read full topic
